data.title: Nick Jr. - Today's TV
data.meta_description: Today's Nick Jr. TV schedule. Check out what's on Nick Jr. today, tonight and beyond with our TV guide.
data.text:
6:00 AM

The Smurfs

Vanity accidentally turns himself into a lizard

Vanity's attempt to cure a spot with a magic spell accidentally turns him into a lizard instead

6:15 AM

The Smurfs

Clumsy and Dimwitty take care of Baby

When Clumsy and Dimwitty take care of Baby, they try to show all of the village how smurfsome they really are

6:30 AM

Blaze and the Monster Machines

A dragon steals a vital recharging machine from a band of knight-trucks

The monster-truck visits the kingdom of knight-trucks, where a dragon has snatched a vital machine used by the chivalrous vehicles to recharge

7:50 AM

Peppa Pig

Peppa has a day out with her family at Tiny Land

Peppa has a day out with her family and Suzy Sheep at Tiny Land. They see tiny dinosaurs, their favourite tiny landmarks and even a tiny Miss Rabbit

8:00 AM

Dora

Dora gets baby crocs to sleep in 'Croc-A-Bye Baby', The ...

Dora gets baby crocs to sleep in 'Croc-A-Bye Baby', The Troll appears in 'Wanna Empanada?', Boots tries new boots in 'if The Boot Fits', and the twins have problems with a 'Pinata Party'.

8:15 AM

Dora

Dora and Boots get a baby back to its mama in 'The Littl...

Dora and Boots get a baby back to its mama in 'The Little Axolotl', and in 'Bubble Trouble', Dora must save the Big Red Chicken who floats away in a bubble right before the big talent show.

8:30 AM

Gabby's Dollhouse

Gabby receives a special nighttime delivery, unboxing a...

Gabby receives a special nighttime delivery, unboxing a glow-in-the-dark train engine. However, she realises that she's missing the other three train cars to complete the whole train. Gabby Cats help Gabby build the other three glow-in...

12:45 PM

Dora

Boots needs to rescue Isa on their 'Friendaversary Adve...

Boots needs to rescue Isa on their 'Friendaversary Adventure', then in 'Swiper's Birthday Surprise', Dora brings a gift to a Swiper's party and must stop him from swiping his own gift!

1:00 PM

Dora

Isa's throwing a party where everyone will be dancing i...

Isa's throwing a party where everyone will be dancing in 'The Rainforest Ritmo', then in 'The Magic Nut', Dora leads everyone into the Tricky Trappy Forest to recover Tico's magic nut.

1:15 PM

Dora

Dora and Boots get a baby back to its mama in 'The Littl...

Dora and Boots get a baby back to its mama in 'The Little Axolotl', and in 'Bubble Trouble', Dora must save the Big Red Chicken who floats away in a bubble right before the big talent show.

3:15 PM

Thomas & Friends: All Engines Go!

Harold the Helicopter's dream to see the Northern Lights goes awry

Harold the Helicopter's dream to see the Northern Lights goes awry when the overly-excited engine race ignores warnings to stay away from the Sodor Suspension Bridge

3:30 PM

Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom

The elves and fairies encounter a dwarf mine

The elves and fairies encounter a speaking door and a dwarf mine while on the lookout for Gaston

3:45 PM

Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom

The naughty toddlers cause chaos again. Mrs Fotheringill ...

The naughty toddlers cause chaos again. Mrs Fotheringill gets zapped back to the stone-age, and Nanny Plum turns everyone into frogs.

4:30 PM

The Adventures of Paddington

Something is making strange noises in 'Paddington's...

Something is making strange noises in 'Paddington's Mysterious Cave Discovery', and in 'Paddington and the Fossil Hunt', Judy wants to find a fossil on the beach, but isn't having any luck

4:45 PM

The Adventures of Paddington

Whose story will earn them a camp fire story-telling badge?

Whose story will earn them a camp fire story telling badge, and will any of them be too scary?

7:00 PM

Baby Shark's Big Show!

When dancing is outlawed in Carnivore Cove, Baby Shark w...

When dancing is outlawed in Carnivore Cove, Baby Shark will do whatever it takes to get the town dancing again!

7:15 PM

8:00 PM

The Smurfs

When the Smurfs find a note from Gargamel begging for hi...

When the Smurfs find a note from Gargamel begging for his mother because he's sick, they feel obliged to help him.

8:15 PM

The Smurfs

When he's sidelined from the Smurfball tournament, Grouc...

When he's sidelined from the Smurfball tournament, Grouchy heads to the forest and befriends Bigmouth.

8:30 PM

Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom

Holly and Ben go on a picnic

Holly invites Ben to join her at the annual royal fairy picnic

8:45 PM

Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom

The twins have a birthday party

The twins cause chaos when they invite their friends to the castle for a birthday party

11:30 PM

Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom

Holly loses her magic wand

Holly loses her magic wand, so Ben uses his elf skills to find it

11:45 PM

Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom

Holly visits the elf farm to collect an egg

Holly visits the elf farm to collect an egg for the king's breakfast, but an enormous chicken escapes and runs amok

12:00 AM

Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom

Daisy and Poppy transform the kingdom's residents

Daisy and Poppy use a magic wand to turn the kingdom's residents into rabbits, frogs and birds

12:15 AM

Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom

Holly breaks her mother's teapot

Holly breaks her mother's new teapot, and Ben helps her try to repair it

1:45 AM

Peppa Pig

Suzy has an imaginary friend

Suzy Sheep has come to play with Peppa and has made up a pretend friend called Leo Lion

1:50 AM

Peppa Pig

George and Peppa paint a picture

Peppa, George and Daddy are in the garden painting a picture of a cherry tree when the ducks run through the paint and all over their masterpiece

2:00 AM

Dora

Dora and Boots get a baby back to its mama in 'The Littl...

Dora and Boots get a baby back to its mama in 'The Little Axolotl', and in 'Bubble Trouble', Dora must save the Big Red Chicken who floats away in a bubble right before the big talent show.

6:00 AM

The Smurfs

Brainy is injured

Brainy is injured so Papa Smurf asks Monkey to take his place as his assistant

6:15 AM

The Smurfs

Smurfette rescues Brainy from a giant snake

Smurfette rescues Brainy from a giant snake, so the other Smurfs ask her to teach them Smurf-Fu
